### A Note on Pricing

Because each pie is lovingly baked in my home kitchen, the costs are a bit higher than mass-produced alternatives. Every pie is about 24 cm in diameter and serves around 6 – 8 people… depending on how big their sweet tooth is.


<section id="order">
  <h1>Place an Order</h1>
  <form action="https://formsubmit.co/marianna.rosso3@gmail.com" method="POST">
    
    <!-- Basic info -->
    <label for="name">Name</label>
    <input type="text" id="name" name="name" required>

    <label for="email">Email</label>
    <input type="email" id="email" name="email" required>

    <!-- Order details -->
    <label for="product">What would you like?</label>
    <select id="product" name="product" required>
      <option value="Cinnamon Apple Pie">Cinnamon Apple Pie</option>
      <option value="Chocolat-y Pecan Pie">Chocolat-y Pecan Pie</option>
      <option value="Sweet Potato Casserole Pie">Sweet Potato Casserole Pie</option>
      <option value="Seasonal Pie">Seasonal Pie</option>
      <option value="Sesame Rice Krispies Treats">Sesame Rice Krispies Treats</option>
      <option value="Cornbread with Bell Pepper Cream and Feta">Cornbread with Bell Pepper Cream and Feta</option>
      <option value="Custom Order">Custom Order</option>
    </select>


    <label for="message">Questions / Special Requests / Custom Order</label>
    <textarea id="message" name="message" rows="4"></textarea>

    <!-- FormSubmit settings -->
    <input type="hidden" name="_subject" value="New Pie Order!">
    <input type="hidden" name="_captcha" value="false">

    <button type="submit">Send Order</button>
  </form>
</section>
